childrenComponentProp.name: status
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Determines the color and icon of the alert box.

childrenComponentProp.name: isVisible
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Show or hide the alert. Useful for alerts triggered by app interaction.

childrenComponentProp.name: content
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Body content of the alert, which can also be passed via children.

childrenComponentProp.name: onCloseAlert
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Close event handler if the alert  can be dismissed or closed.

childrenComponentProp.name: scrollOnShow
childrenComponentProp.docblock: If true, page scrolls to alert when it is shown.

childrenComponentProp.name: className
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Optional class name to add to the alert box.

childrenComponentProp.name: backgroundOnly
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
If true, renders an AlertBox with only a background color, without an
accented left edge or an icon

childrenComponentProp.name: level
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The header level to use with the headline prop, must be a number 1-6

frontmatter.name: AlertBox
frontmatter.tags: informational, warning, error, success, continue, dismissable
frontmatter.title: AlertBox
